nodes.text: The Sphere of Laws and Justice, also known as the Ministry of Laws and Justice and the Pyramid of Laws and Justice, was one of twelve Spheres of Influence of the reconstituted Sith Empire. Founded in 4980 BBY, the Sphere was controlled by a member of the Empire's ruling Dark Council, and oversaw the Empire's internal law enforcement and judicial systems.

During the Cold War between the Empire and the Galactic Republic, the Sith Lord Darth Mortis headed the Sphere. In his role as head of the Sphere, Mortis sent his apprentice Zavrasha to the moon of Nar Shaddaa in order to ensure that the Imperial Military's actions there did not endanger the Treaty of Coruscant with the Republic.
The Sphere of Laws and Justice was first introduced in the 2012 reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia, in the section on the Spheres of Influence.
